bug_description: Search stops works, but clicking 'View Departures' shows 'no upcoming departures' even when timetable has scheduled services. Static GTFS data not showing, only real-time attempted. Issue affects all stop types (train/bus/metro).
scope: Phase 2 - Static departures from GTFS timetable not displaying
user_constraints: No implementation - diagnosis and detailed resolution plan only
Must test hypotheses before concluding root cause
Must include comprehensive API test plan in resolution report
